verses.textEn: And the entire multitude responded, and they said with a great voice: “In accord with your word to us, so let be it done.
verses.textLa: Et respondit universa multitudo, dixitque voce magna: Iuxta verbum tuum ad nos, sic fiat.

verses.textEn: Yet truly, since the people are many, and it is the time of rain, and we cannot endure standing outside, and this is not a task for one or two days, (for certainly we have sinned greatly in this matter,)
verses.textLa: Verumtamen quia populus multus est, et tempus pluviæ, et non sustinemus stare foris, et opus non est diei unius vel duorum (vehementer quippe peccavimus in sermone isto)
verses.notes: The ninth month here refers to the sacred calendar, which begins with Nissan (March-April); the ninth month is Kislev (Nov.-Dec.). In Israel, the winter is the rainy season.

verses.textEn: let leaders be appointed among the entire multitude. And in all our cities, let those who have taken foreign wives arrive at appointed times, and with them the elders from city to city, and the judges, until the wrath of our God has been averted from us over this sin.”
verses.textLa: constituantur principes in universa multitudine: et omnes in civitatibus nostris qui duxerunt uxores alienigenas veniant in temporibus statutis, et cum his seniores per civitatem et civitatem, et iudices eius donec avertatur ira Dei nostri a nobis super peccato hoc.

verses.textEn: And so Jonathan, the son of Asahel, and Jahzeiah, the son of Tikvah, were appointed over this, and the Levites Meshullam and Shabbethai assisted them.
verses.textLa: Igitur Ionathan filius Azahel, et Iaasia filius Thecue, steterunt super hoc, et Messollam et Sebethai Levites adiuverunt eos:

verses.textEn: And the sons of the transmigration did so. And Ezra, the priest, and the men who were the leaders of the families in the houses of their fathers, and all according to their names, went and sat down, on the first day of the tenth month, so that they might examine the matter.
verses.textLa: Feceruntque sic filii transmigrationis. Et abierunt Esdras Sacerdos, et viri principes familiarum in domos patrum suorum, et omnes per nomina sua, et sederunt in die primo mensis decimi ut quærerent rem.

verses.textEn: And they made an end with all the men who had taken foreign wives, by the first day of the first month.
verses.textLa: Et consummati sunt omnes viri, qui duxerant uxores alienigenas, usque ad diem primam mensis primi.
verses.notes: They decided to break from association with the men who had taken foreign wives beginning on the first day of the next sacred calendar year: Nissan 1.

verses.textEn: And there were found among the sons of the priests some who had taken foreign wives: From the sons of Jeshua, the son of Jozadak, and his brothers, Maaseiah, and Eliezer, and Jarib, and Gedaliah.
verses.textLa: Et inventi sunt de filiis sacerdotum qui duxerant uxores alienigenas. De filiis Iosue filii Iosedec, et fratres eius, Maasia, et Eliezer, et Iarib, et Godolia.

verses.textEn: And they swore with their hands that they would cast aside their wives, and that they would offer for their offense a ram from among the sheep.
verses.textLa: Et dederunt manus suas ut eiicerent uxores suas, et pro delicto suo arietem de ovibus offerrent.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Immer, Hanani and Zebadiah.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Emmer, Hanani, et Zebedia.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Harim, Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Harim, Maasia, et Elia, et Semeia, et Iehiel, et Ozias.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Pashhur, Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Pheshur, Elioenai, Maasia, Ismael, Nathanael, Iozabed, et Elasa.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of the Levites, Jozabad, and Shimei, and Kelaiah, the same is Kelita, Pethahiah, Judah, and Eliezer.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Levitarum, Iozabed, et Semei, et Celaia, ipse est Calita, Phataia, Iuda, et Eliezer.

verses.textEn: And from the singing men, Eliashib. And from the gatekeepers, Shallum, and Telem, and Uri.
verses.textLa: Et de cantoribus, Eliasib. Et de ianitoribus, Sellum, et Telem, et Uri.

verses.textEn: And out of Israel, from the sons of Parosh, Ramiah, and Izziah, and Malchijah, and Mijamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.
verses.textLa: Et ex Israel, de filiis Pharos, Remeia, et Iesia, et Melchia, et Miamin, et Eliezer, et Melchia, et Banea.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Elam, Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Elijah.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Ælam, Mathania, Zacharias, et Iehiel, et Abdi, et Ierimoth, et Elia.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Zattu, Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Zethua, Elioenai, Eliasib, Mathania, et Ierimuth, et Zabad, et Aziza.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Bebai, Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, Athlai.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Bebai, Iohanan, Hanania, Zabbai, Athalai.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Bani, Meshullam, and Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Bani, Mosollam, et Melluch, et Adaia, Iasub, et Saal, et Ramoth.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Pahath-moab, Adna, and Chelal, Benaiah, and Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel, Binnui, and Manasseh.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Phahath Moab, Edna, et Chalal, Banaias, et Maasias, Mathanias, Beseleel, Bennui, et Manasse.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Harim, Eliezer, Jeshua, Malchijah, Shemaiah, Simeon,
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Herem, Eliezer, Iosue, Melchias, Semeias, Simeon,

verses.textEn: Benjamin, Malluch, Shemariah.
verses.textLa: Beniamin, Maloch, Samarias.

verses.textEn: And from the sons of Hashum, Mattenai, Mattettah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, Shimei.
verses.textLa: Et de filiis Hasom, Mathanai, Mathatha, Zabad, Eliphelet, Iermai, Manasse, Semei.

verses.textEn: From the sons of Bani, Maadai, Amram, and Uel,
verses.textLa: De filiis Bani, Maadi, Amram, et Uel,

verses.textEn: Benaiah, and Bedeiah, Cheluhi,
verses.textLa: Baneas, et Badaias, Cheliau,

verses.textEn: Vaniah, Meremoth, and Eliashib,
verses.textLa: Vania, Marimuth, et Eliasib,

verses.textEn: Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasu,
verses.textLa: Mathanias, Mathanai, et Iasi,

verses.textEn: and Bani, and Binnui, Shimei,
verses.textLa: et Bani, et Bennui, Semei,

verses.textEn: and Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,
verses.textLa: et Salmias, et Nathan, et Adaias,

verses.textEn: and Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
verses.textLa: et Mechnedebai, Sisai, Sarai,

verses.textEn: Azarel, and Shelemiah, Shemariah,
verses.textLa: Ezrel, et Selemiau, Semeria,

verses.textEn: Shallum, Amariah, Joseph.
verses.textLa: Sellum, Amaria, Ioseph.

verses.textEn: From the sons of Nebo, Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, and Joel, and Benaiah.
verses.textLa: De filiis Nebo, Iehiel, Mathathias, Zabad, Zabina, Ieddu, et Ioel, et Banaia.

verses.textEn: All these had taken foreign wives, and there were among them women who had borne sons.
verses.textLa: Omnes hi acceperant uxores alienigenas, et fuerunt ex eis mulieres, quæ pepererant filios.
